text: Kare ga isseini kare-ra o shōshū sa reru hi,(-nushi wa) `Jin no katagata yo, anata gata wa hitobito no ōku o madowa seta nodearu.'(To ōse rareyou. ) Hitobito no naka, kare-ra (Jin) no tomo ga ite iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa tagaini riyō shi aimashitaga, anata ga watashi-tachi ni sadame rareta kigen ga tōrai shimashita.' Kare wa ōse rareyou. `Gōka ga anata gata no sumaidearu.' Arrā no o konomi ni naru kagiri, eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Hontōni anata no omo wa eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru
